name: Dave & The Machine
description:
Hello adventure!

You are Dave. Dave is a good soldier, he has to defend the 'machine' because some higher ups said so. Dave has to defend the 'machine' as long as possible form the seemingly endless horde of evil slimes. 

You can control Dave by pressing W, A,S,D and you can shoot by pressing UP,DOWN,LEFT,RIGHT

In the level Dave can find stones he can pick up to power up the 'machine'. By doing so the 'machine' will stay alive longer.
